content: CLI Integration Bug Fix: Fixed critical installation bug preventing CLI functionality due to missing Python package installation. Root cause: NPM package installation did not include Python package installation step, causing ModuleNotFoundError when running claude-pm CLI from directories outside framework. Solution: Enhanced postinstall-minimal.js to include Python package installation with --break-system-packages fallback, added CLI fallback mechanisms for automatic package installation, updated package.json scripts. Fixed affects fresh installations and Homebrew Python environments.

technical_details.root_cause: Missing Python package installation in NPM postinstall flow
solution_components: Enhanced postinstall-minimal.js with Python package installation
Added CLI fallback mechanisms for missing module scenarios
Proper handling of externally-managed Python environments
